relation: I am just starting so everything is fun.
I have not dined at the college yet.
I do not live in a dorm.
I am in online classes, but I attend all functions I can.
Spend time getting to know your college layout before school starts.
I love this college. They have treated me with respect all the way. They helped me any time I needed.
pageTitle: Ivy Tech Community College-Northeast Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {94283=Ivy Tech Northeast is a great, fast-track to a degree that will place you in a career. The campus has been updated, the curriculum has grown immensely, and there's a better student life available than when I first attended in 2003. I like Ivy Tech much better than when I attended IPFW., 52555=You get SO much for your dollar. It costs about $1500 for a semester of classes here (full time), while at other places it can cost $25,000 a semester (at least for culinary), 142200=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 117724=Ivy Tech in Fort Wayne has came a long way since I started in 2011. the Academic center is much improved and the advisors seem to have the students best interest in mind. my rating for this college would be a 8 out of 10, 50155=I am very please with the traditional classroom experience that I have had at this campus since 12/2010}
